channel.title: Client Item Adding Help
channel.description: Hi, Im making a client for my server but I really have no idea how to add items into my client (its important that my players can see items). The reason I need to add items into my client is because when I use my client Im unable to see certain items such as The Void Knight set. I also know someone is going to say "Use the Search button!", I did but came up with nothing so if anyone could help me Id be really grateful!

item.title: Client Item Adding Help
item.dc:creator: @omgnub2 omgnub2
item.description:
@omgnub2 wrote:

No one knows how?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Item Adding Help
item.dc:creator: @omgnub2 omgnub2
item.description:
@omgnub2 wrote:

Erm not exactly what I was looking for. Let me explain, my client that Im making for my server doesn’t have the required models (items models). So when I load up my client and look at a specific item it shows it as “null”.So I tried to search through the forums to try and find a solution but I had no luck and only got hints of what to do. People in other threads told other people to add “the item” to the client to fix the client. I was wondering how I could add “the item” to the client so It didn’t show up as null, but showed up as the actual item on my server. Sorry for not explaining the situation accordingly.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Item Adding Help
item.dc:creator: @Aqua_link Aqua link
item.description:
@Aqua_link wrote:

If you mean shops, get a Shopmaker. ya. Enter the item id and the price of it? Compiler with right JDK installed. Hope this helps?

Read full topic
